wikipedia_page.main: Colin Richard Smith (born 3 November 1958) is an English former footballer who played in the Football League as a defender for Nottingham Forest, Norwich City, Cardiff City and Aldershot, in non-league football for Wokingham Town, and in Hong Kong for Sea Bee.

response: *Colin Smith (religious and hymnodist) (1928-2005), Australian Christian Brother and hymnodist
